category.name: General
category.category_description: No description available for this category.

preference.name: Tc_allowed_rdv_configured_plmxml_dataset_types
preference.preference_description: This preference is set to enable which dataset type the user wants to see in thin client while using adhoc configurator function in DesignContext module. This should be "ON" to see the dataset containing preconfigured plmxml file and "OFF" to see the dataset with unconfig plmxml file
